Class MyMain

java.lang.Object
MyMain
public class MyMain extends Object
The class tests the functionality of Lab03.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    MyMain()
    Defines a command-line interface for interacting with a clothing store management system, allowing users to perform operations such as adding/removing customers, managing clothing items, and saving/loading the database from/to disk.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method and Description
    static void main(String[] args)
    The main entry point for the program. Accepts command-line arguments and initiates program execution.
    static void interactiveSession(String customersFileName, String itemsFilename)
    Initiates an interactive session, prompting the user for input files and interacting with the ClothingStore accordingly.
    static void printMenu()
    Prints the menu options for the interactive session.
    static int selectIntOption(Scanner sc, int fn, int ln)
    Prompts the user to select an integer option within a specified range.
    static void addCustomer(ClothingStore clothingStore, Scanner sc)
    Adds a new customer to the ClothingStore based on user input.
    static void removeCustomer(ClothingStore clothingStore, Scanner sc)
    Removes a customer from the ClothingStore based on user input.
    static void displayCustomerInfo(ClothingStore clothingStore, Scanner sc)
    Displays information about a specific customer based on user input.
    static void displayAllCustomerIDs(ClothingStore clothingStore)
    Displays all customer IDs in the ClothingStore.
    static void addClothingItem(ClothingStore clothingStore, Scanner sc)
    Adds a new clothing item to the ClothingStore based on user input.
    static void removeItem(ClothingStore clothingStore, Scanner sc)
    Removes a clothing item from the ClothingStore based on user input.
    static void displayItemInfo(ClothingStore clothingStore, Scanner sc)
    Displays information about a specific clothing item based on user input.
    static void displayAllItemIDs(ClothingStore clothingStore)
    Displays all clothing item IDs in the ClothingStore.
    static void searchItemsByBrand(ClothingStore clothingStore, Scanner sc)
    Searches for clothing items in the ClothingStore based on the brand specified by the user.
    static void searchItemsBySize(ClothingStore clothingStore, Scanner sc)
    Searches for clothing items in the ClothingStore based on the size specified by the user.
    static void purchaseItem(ClothingStore clothingStore, Scanner sc)
    Allows the user to purchase a clothing item from the ClothingStore.
    static void checkItemStock(ClothingStore clothingStore, Scanner sc)
    Checks the stock level of a specific clothing item in the ClothingStore.
    static void loadDatabaseFromDisk(ClothingStore clothingStore, String customersFileName, String itemsFileName)
    Loads the ClothingStore database from disk using specified file names.
    static void saveDatabaseToDisk(ClothingStore clothingStore, String customersFileName, String itemsFileName)
    Saves the ClothingStore database to disk using specified file names.
